About.paragraph: Founded on November 23, 1951, the Diocesan Shrine of St. Joseph is strategically located along one of the stations (Anonas) of the LRT system. The Shrine primarily caters to the Catholic faithful of eight barangays under the Diocese of Cubao. The current parish priest is Rev. Fr. Ronaldo M. Macale.
